search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PTminder (ptminder.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PTminder is: [https://www.ptminder.com/pricing](https://www.ptminder.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Branded Mobile Apps Add-on
--------------------------

Increase your brand exposure, improve your sales, and retain more clients. We can build custom branded apps for your business (iOS and Android). The app will have your own brand logo and color themes, which we list in the app stores for you under your own name and descriptions. Branded apps add enormous value for your business by giving you a professional look and a great client experience connecting with your brand.  
Branded Apps are a paid add-on at USD $36/month (other currencies available & annual discounts).  
‍

[Learn More](https://www.ptminder.com/branded-apps)

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/60b1115234cfe8d527c58ce3_Branded%20Mobile%20Apps-min.png)

All plans include
-----------------

![Image 12: Client Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d293b35e06f4c3c8999a1d7_account.svg)

#### Client Management

Everything you need in one place. Easily keep track of your clients' information including their bookings, payments and progress.

![Image 13: Bookings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d293b774a8706405725d166_calendar%20(2).svg)

#### **Bookings, Calendar, Scheduling**

A powerful Calendar booking system for you to plan your week. Manage client bookings for sessions, classes, and set your availability for those making online bookings with you.

![Image 14: Online Payments](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d293b879ea87f610a0656f7_business-card.svg)

#### Online Payments

Give clients the freedom to view your schedule, book and pay for their next appointment - all from their smart phone. Take control of your income. Choose when and how you get paid. Never chase late payments again.

![Image 15: Workout & Nutrition](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d5235ac2df04609286fdd8e_clipboard.svg)

#### Workout & Nutrition Planners

Easily send Workout and Nutrition plans directly to clients.. Start tracking your clients' progress and results.

![Image 16: Reporting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d5235f27d6b7b14cfe976cf_data-analytics.svg)

#### Reporting

See how your business is tracking with our general and financial reports. From attendance reports, to income reports, you'll always be able to see how things are performing.

![Image 17: Live Chat](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d5236256f0ecb65e1c2f0fe_24-hours.svg)

#### 24 x 7 Live Chat Help

Our amazing team is here to help. Questions, suggestions, you name it - start a Live Chat with one of our friendly agents for assistance.

Questions and answers
---------------------

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### How does the 14 day free trial work exactly?

After signing up, you’ll enjoy all PTminder features for 14 days, free of charge. There is no credit card required to activate your trial. At the end of the 14 days, you will need to upgrade to a paid plan to continue using it. Don't worry - we'll send you reminders before the trial ends!

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### What is considered a 'Client' for billing?

We only count 'Active' & 'Lead' clients towards your billing plan count. 'Inactive' clients are excluded. You choose whether a client is active or inactive by setting their status. Active & Lead clients can have bookings, make payments, login etc. Inactive clients cannot do any of these actions.

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan as my business changes?

Yes! Your plan will automatically scale up based on the number of 'Active' clients you have. 'Inactive' clients do not count towards your plan count. You decide whether a client is active or inactive, so make sure to keep your client list up to date. You can also upgrade or downgrade at any time manually. When a plan change happens, you will receive either a pro-rated charge or credit, depending on the price of your new plan.

![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### Is my data secure?

Yes! Data security is our highest priority. We use the highest level of SSL encryption (the same as what banks use). Please reference our [Privacy Policy](https://www.ptminder.com/privacy) for a detailed outline of if, how and when we collect, use and disclose your business data and/or personal information.

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### What if I need help getting setup, or have any questions?

Our friendly customer support team is available 24/7 by Live Chat. Simply click on the chat icon down the bottom-right of the screen to start a conversation! You can also check out our [Help Center](http://help.ptminder.com/) for articles and instructions on how to use PTminder.

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### Are there any additional costs?

All features are included across all plans. There are two types of optional additional costs:  
1\. When purchasing you want to send SMS's out to your clients.  
2\. If you want your own [Branded App](https://www.ptminder.com/branded-apps), which is an add-on to your existing plan.

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### Do my clients need to pay anything?

No way, there are no charges for your clients to use the platform. Your clients will be paying YOU, for the Personal Training services you provide them. Activate one of our integratedand you'll be collecting client payments in no time!

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5d1f053cee3b9da3d699a858/5d1f053cee3b9d63af99a907_question-icon.svg)

##### Can I cancel my account anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your account at anytime, no further charges will take place once you do this. Your account will still remain active and accessible up until the end of your current billing cycle which has been paid up to.

Start your free 14 day trial
----------------------------

Your Opt Out Preference Signal is Honored

Cookie Settings
---------------

When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences or your device, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. However, you can choose not to allow certain types of cookies, which may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings according to your preference. You cannot opt-out of our First Party Strictly Necessary Cookies as they are deployed in order to ensure the proper functioning of our website (such as prompting the cookie banner and remembering your settings, to log into your account, to redirect you when you log out, etc.). For more information about the First and Third Party Cookies used please follow this link.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Share Or Sale of Personal Data

 Share Or Sale of Personal Data

Under the CPRA, you have the right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of your personal information to third parties. These cookies collect information for analytics and to personalize your experience with targeted ads. You may exercise your right to opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information by using this toggle switch. If you opt out we will not be able to offer you personalized ads and will not hand over your personal information to any third parties. Additionally, you may contact our legal department for further clarification about your rights as a California consumer by using this Exercise My Rights link.If you have enabled privacy controls on your browser (such as a plugin), we have to take that as a valid request to opt-out. Therefore we would not be able to track your activity through the web. This may affect our ability to personalize ads according to your preferences.

*   ##### Social Media Cookies
    
     Switch Label label
    
    These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
    

*   ##### Performance Cookies
    
     Switch Label label
    
    These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
    

*   ##### Targeting Cookies
    
     Switch Label label
    
    These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
